resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Barrels and Buckets: Access to Water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fässer und Wannen: Greifen Sie zum Wasser 
zu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Barils et positions : Accédez à l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tambores e cubetas: Alcance à água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Barilotti e benne: Accedi a ad acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρέλια και κάδοι: Πρόσβαση στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Barriles y compartimientos: Tenga acceso al 
agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">teaches students about access to water in Kenya, Ghana, and their own community as they read stories by Peace Corps Volunteers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtet Kursteilnehmer über Zugriff zum 
Wasser in Kenia, Ghana, und ihre eigene Gemeinschaft, während sie 
Geschichten durch Friedenskorpse lesen, erbietet sich freiwillig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseigne des étudiants au sujet de l'accès à 
l'eau au Kenya, Ghana, et leur propre communauté pendant qu'ils 
lisent des histoires par des corps de paix offre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensina estudantes sobre o acesso à água em 
Kenya, Ghana, e sua própria comunidade enquanto lêem histórias por 
corpos de paz oferece-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegna gli allievi circa accesso ad acqua nel 
Kenia, Ghana e la loro propria Comunità mentre leggono le storia da 
Peace corpo si offre volontariamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδάσκει τους σπουδαστές για την πρόσβαση στο ύδωρ 
στην Κένυα, την Γκάνα, και την κοινότητά τους δεδομένου ότι 
διαβάζουν τις ιστορίες από τους εθελοντές ειρήνης Σώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseña a estudiantes sobre el acceso al agua en 
Kenia, Ghana, y su propia comunidad como leen historias de los cuerpos
de paz se ofrece voluntariamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206719</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108506</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/barrels-and-buckets-access-to-water</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
